SEARCH
Package DepartmentObject

Class Pharmacy

java.lang.Object
DepartmentObject.Pharmacy
public class Pharmacy extends Object
The Pharmacy class manages the medicine stock for the Hospital Management System

An instance of this class works off of one database (one text file), allowing the Hospital Management System to include multiple pharmacy department if needed.

This class uses the MedicineData class to store information for each medicine in the hospital

MedicineRequest and RestockRequest classes are used to to keep track of the transaction going on within the Pharmacy

See Also:
  • MedicineData - Data type to store medicine details
  • MedicineRequest - Data type to store medicine request details
  • RestockRequest - Data type to store medicine restock details

      public boolean checkFulfillable(String medicineName, int amount)
      Checks whether the Pharmacy has enough medicine to fulfill the request
      Parameters:
      medicineName - name of medicine to prescribe
      amount - amount to be prescribed
      Returns:
      true when there is enough stock, false otherwise

    • prescribeMedicine

      public boolean prescribeMedicine(String medicineName, int amount)
      Prescribes the medicine by deducting given amount from medicineName in the medicineStorage
      Parameters:
      medicineName - name of medicine
      amount - amount of that medicine
      Returns:
      true if medicine is prescribed from Pharmacy

    • viewStock

      public void viewStock(HashMap<Integer,Integer> currentRequest)
      Prints out the stock of the medicine in medicineStorage with its pending amount in pendingAmount

      Takes in a HashMap<Integer,Integer> storing the indenting amount which is to be printed

      Parameters:
      currentRequest - HashMap<Integer,Integer> storing the indenting amount

    • updatePendingRestock

      public void updatePendingRestock(boolean Add, RestockRequest request)
      Updates the HashMap<Integer,Integer> pendingAmount when there is a new indent or a restock has been fulfilled
      Parameters:
      Add - true adds to the pending amount, false subtracts from the pending amount
      request - RestockRequest to be referenced to

      ID - ID to be checked
      Returns:
      true if there is a medicine with that ID, false otherwise

    • isMedicine

      public boolean isMedicine(String medicine)

      Parameters:
      medicine - name of Medicine
      Returns:

    • convertNameToID

      public int convertNameToID(String medicineName)
      Takes in a medicine name and converts it into its ID by looking at the HashMap<String,Integer> nameToID
      Parameters:
      medicineName - the name of the mdicine
      Returns:
      the ID with that medicine name, null if no medicine with that name in the Pharmacy

    • loadFile

      public void loadFile()
      Used to read and load in data from the file.

      Creates a new File and Scanner with the file name pharmacyFileName and passes it into the function loadData()
